description:
html: parse the contents of <iframe> elements as raw text

Pass tests5.dat, test 4:
<iframe> <!---> </iframe>x

| <html>
|   <head>
|   <body>
|     <iframe>
|       " <!---> "
|     "x"

Also pass tests through test 9:
<style> <!</-- </style>x
